QuestData.Title: The Conquest Pit: Bear Wrestling!
QuestData.Description: So you're interested in the fights, eh? Well, Krenna has outlawed pit-fighting for all enlisted combatants. But you, my friend, are technically a free agent and are not included in this prohibition.$B$BNice loophole, eh?$B$BAnyway, if you're interested I can start you off with something easy, a measly bear. I'll even let you bring friends along!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Ironhide inside the Conquest Pit and speak to Bookie Vel'jen for a reward.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bookie Vel'jen at Conquest Hold in Grizzly Hills.
QuestData.CompletionText: It's not over until you or the bear tips over, friend!
QuestData.RewardText: Nice work, mon! Here's your cut.
